name: Enziclor  Dental Gel 50gm gel
description: Benzydamine is an NSAID (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medicine) that reduces pain and swelling (inflammation). Benzydamine is used for mouth ulcers, sore throats, and teething. It comes as mouthwash, mouth spray, and lozenges. Benzydamine is available on prescription or to buy from a pharmacy.
label: medicine
